verbs.description: [ARG1: The briefing] [V: arrives] [ARGM-TMP: after Trump weighed in on the cultural controversy surrounding the cancellation of " Roseanne " after the show 's star , Roseanne Barr , tweeted a racist joke about former Obama advisor Valerie Jarrett] .
